skills.desc: Attacks 1 enemy 2 times. Has a 35% chance of placing a [Stun] debuff for 1 turn. The chance increases to 50% if the target's Turn Meter is equal to or below 50%.
skills.name: Gigantic Cleavers
skills.books:
Lvl. 2 Damage +5%
Lvl. 3 Damage +5%
Lvl. 4 Damage +5%
Lvl. 5 Damage +5%

skills.desc: Attacks 1 enemy 4 times. Each critical hit has a 50% chance of decreasing the cooldown of Gore Maker by 1 turn.
skills.name: Hack to Bits
skills.books:
Lvl. 2 Damage +5%
Lvl. 3 Damage +5%
Lvl. 4 Damage +5%
Lvl. 5 Damage +5%

skills.desc: Attacks all enemies. Will ignore 20% of each target’s DEF. Will ignore a further 5% of DEF for each buff on the target.
skills.name: Gore Maker
skills.books:
Lvl. 2 Damage +5%
Lvl. 3 Damage +5%
Lvl. 4 Damage +5%
Lvl. 5 Damage +5%

skills.desc:
Increases this Champion’s SPD by 6 and C. DMG by 7% for each enemy this Champion kills in a Round.

Stacks up to +30 SPD and +35% C. DMG. Stacks will reset if this Champion is killed.

Whenever an enemy Champion is revived, fills this Champion’s Turn Meter by 30% for each revived enemy, then places a 50% [Increase ATK] buff and a 30% [Increase C. DMG] buff on this Champion for 1 turn.
skills.name: War Machine [P]
